content:
I’ve been an avid gamer for nearly my entire life, and ever since I was twelve years old, most of that gaming has been on a PC. I’ve used so many different gaming mice, but the first favorite that I ever used was the SteelSeries Kana v2. It was an ambidextrous mouse that felt nice

The post SteelSeries Aerox 3 Wireless (2022) Review – A light mouse at a heavy price appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The SteelSeries Aerox 3 Wireless is a wireless mouse from SteelSeries. It's a great mouse, but look for it at a discount.
